name: Raccoon with Gun
description:
This game is for the Brackey's Game Jam 2021.2!

This game is about a raccoon who doesn't want the fire to be gone

So he kills birds who wants the fire to be gone with a gun

This game was made in 1 day(because of tests) so no music and not that good graphics

I'm sorry, it sucks a bunch also the raycast didn't wanna work properly so ya, thats a bug

Hope You Enjoy !
